modName: Game of Thrones Character presets for RaceMenu
summary: A small project that provides preset slots (basically face looks) of Game Of Thrones character, for you to use in character creation, if you have RaceMenu (and a few others) installed.
descriptionHtml:
Game of Thrones character presets for the RaceMenu mod

[b]!!! NOTE: EVERYTHING about this is very much work in progress - installation instructions, requirements, and actual work on the models! !!![/b]

[b]Required Mods:[/b]

- [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925]CharGen Extension[/url] (only the CharGen Morphs v2-1-4 and CharGen Morphs v2-1-4 ECE files, CORE already comes with RaceMenu so no need to download it)
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[b]Recommended Mods:[/b]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35092]ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture[/url] (main files + update + men + women)
- UNP bodies
- "Mature skin texture and body for UNP" works well for the older female characters
- "Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP" works well for the younger female characters
- ENB + a ENB preset of your choosing that has sub-surface scattering enabled to get more realistic skin (as in my screenshots)



[b]Instructions:[/b]

- Install the required mods
- Download one of the files (see below for list of which is for which character)
- Place file in Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets directory. If it does not exist, create it.
- If the file already overrides an existing preset there, simply rename the preset to another number (RaceMenu supports 0-50 by default)
- Load up the game, create new character (or use "showracemenu" command)
- In the very top of the list of sliders, there should be a slider named "PresetSlot"
- Select appropriate gender! (see list below to see which slot is for which character)
- Use slider to select the slot number for the slot you downloaded (e.g. if you downloaded 3.slot, move slider to 3)
- Press F9 to load preset

NOTE: The presets do not seem to save all the data! For example: face complexion is NOT saved. Neither is body and head size! You will have to edit these manually to obtain the full results.


[b]Current Character list (also included in info.txt inside main download[/b]

0 - Ned Stark
1 - Catelyn Stark
2 - Robb Stark
3 - Jon Snow
4 - Sansa Stark
5 - Arya Stark
author: ZenonSeth
